definition: wheel/disk/ring/steamship/to take turns/to rotate/by turn/classifier for big round objects: disk, or recurring events: round, turn

sentences.english: I worked with the patience of a redwood growing rings.
sentences.chinese: 我这种耐心，堪与红杉树长年轮媲美。

sentences.english: Only in the dark will ring inadvertently substituted.
sentences.chinese: 只是在不经意间暗将年轮偷换。

sentences.english: During the study, researchers recorded the width of the tree rings of balsam firs .
sentences.chinese: 通过这个研究，研究者记录下香脂冷杉的年轮的宽度。

sentences.english: The Maine woodsman sits on a stump whose rings number centuries of growth.
sentences.chinese: 缅茵州的伐木人坐在一段有数百年年轮的木桩上。

sentences.english: To judge by the growth ring of the tree, it must have lived many years.
sentences.chinese: 从年轮来看，这棵树肯定活了很多年了。

sentences.english: Annual-ring width index model is established.
sentences.chinese: 建立了年轮宽度指数模型。

sentences.english: Tree rings are made of tissue called xylem.
sentences.chinese: 构成年轮的组织被称为木质部。

sentences.english: Sometimes, you can find a rings at discounts or pre-owned if required.
sentences.chinese: 有时候，你可以找到一个年轮的折扣或二手如果需要。

sentences.english: That's because trees create a new ring each year.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为树木每年都会产生新的年轮。

sentences.english: Mister Pederson says tree rings can tell about moisture and cloud conditions.
sentences.chinese: 名仕佩德森说，树的年轮可以告诉水分和云条件。

sentences.english: During seasons when water and nutrients are in good supply, trees form broad growth rings.
sentences.chinese: 当水源和营养元素充足时，树木的年轮显得比较宽厚。

sentences.english: But the rings were very small, showing that the trees grew extremely slowly.
sentences.chinese: 但是年轮很小，表明那些树木的生长是极其缓慢的。

sentences.english: The oldest rings are those closest to the center of the tree.
sentences.chinese: 年代最古老的年轮最靠近树心。

sentences.english: In a dry year, they form narrow ones.
sentences.chinese: 在缺雨的年份，它们的年轮就窄小。

sentences.english: We can compare the charcoal and tree-ring fire records.
sentences.chinese: 我们比较了木炭和年轮对火灾的记录。

sentences.english: Dense ring of a circle, to recall the story is less distressed.
sentences.chinese: 年轮一圈圈的密集，能回忆的故事却少的心疼。

definition: great changes/ups and downs/vicissitudes/abbr. of 滄海桑田|沧海桑田[cang1 hai3 sang1 tian2]
the passage of the years/the flow of time
lit. the blue sea turned into mulberry fields (idiom)/fig. the transformations of the world
variant of 枝椏|枝桠[zhi1 ya1]
weather-beaten/having experienced the hardships of life
